TopicTitle: When trying to launch a craft it takes me to the launchpad and am able to intaract and hear sounds but it stays on a screenshot inside the VAB

Articles.Content: It only effects that single craft and no other craft, am able to make chnages in the VAB but I here music from the launchpad and am unable to move camera,  when I press stage I here the staging effect but nothing else happens and only a single craft causes this bug.
